_route: (==)This run folow MrPancakeTurtle's 100% run, the links are here -> .link([VOD 1]https://youtu.be/J3MWwgrkk9M) , .link([VOD 2]https://youtu.be/fcDLoHGBqCU) , .link([VOD 3]https://youtu.be/M27Chx0LEuk) , .link([VOD 4]https://youtu.be/CUhW2MnjNXU)

(==).link([Here]https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SMovk9HxD9_wqcsnHYNq8xmsclU6olqzI3pqu3QZ4Ro/edit#gid=722444247) is a link to a doc of all the materials you can use, note any amiibo/DLC items are not.

SOR.notes: Grab slate, open door, watch opening CS

Boko Bow.notes: Grab some arrows as well, about 5 is fine

Boko Shield + Sword.notes: If he drops 5 arrows, get them

_Tower::GreatPlateau.notes: Fall damage cancel off into old man CS

Iron Sledgehammer.notes: For ores, taluses, and tree launches

_Cook<Stamina Food>.notes: Light pot with fire arrow, 3 skewers of 2 shrooms, 4 of 1 shroom, cook 2x 1 herb, cook 1x 2 hylian shroom

_Korok::P03.notes: Grab fireflies if they spawn, tree launch up

_Warp::Tower::GreatPlateau.notes: Warp cryo and get P08 now if skipped

Register horse.notes: Keep using the horse, it's faster

_Korok::D14.notes: Use bombs to blow up acorn

_Korok::D48.notes: Smash deposits for ore, needed for money

_Material<Swift Violet,6>.notes: Shoot them down off of the cliff

Talk to .npc(Beedle).notes: Buy all arrows, crickets and frogs (for quest). Don't sell flint/rock salt

_Chest::Special<Hestu's Maracas>.notes: Kill bokos by pushing them off the cliff

_Cook<Speed Food>.notes: 1 boko gut, 1 frog, 1 carrot and 2 violets

.item(Gather Fleet Lotus).notes: lotus route .link([here]https://objmap.zeldamods.org/#/map/z7,1822.25,256.25), search for fleet lotus and follow the path. Should have 32 at the end

_Material<Ancient Part>.notes: What part you get is RNG dependent

Smash ores in cave.notes: Kill keese, you want about 4 to 6 wings

Farm Farosh parts.notes: 36 Horn, 2 Claw, 4 Scale, 1 Fang. Pick torch up after

_Cook<Cook food>.notes: 3 endura food, 1 attack up food, 3 hearty food, 3 speed food

Tree lauch to pot.notes: kill boko by pot, use fire rod for lighting

_Cook<Cook food>.notes: 6 speed food, 2 hearty food (radishes), 5 durian food (3x durians)

Talk to .npc(Pruce).notes: Buy bomb arrows (NOT singular ones), arrows and endura shrooms

_Material<Hightail Lizard,5>.notes: Also get radishes, acorns and shrooms

_Shrine::TalohNaeg.notes: Get both chests, do tutorial with moblin club, grab dropped parts

Farm wood while waiting.notes: Be careful as you may alert Dorian with bombs

.boss(Kill Bladmaster).notes: Crit him so he drops the windcleaver

_Shrine::ChaasQeta.notes: Strat is ice arrows, EOD spin attack, repeat. When you have only 1 ice arrow, use shock arrows instead. Throw EOD for crit. Pick up battleaxe, sword and parts.

Begin .!!(Stranded on Eventide).comment: Don't whistle sprint or you'll wake up the hinox

Deposit second orb.notes: Get food on the way to the platform

Deposit third orb.notes: Pancake died here, be extra careful

_Shrine::KatahChuki.notes: Kill guardian with ice arrow + axe, grab halberd

_Shrine::NoyaNeha.notes: Kill guardian with ice arrows + windcleaver, grab axe and parts

_Cook<Cook food>.notes: 3 stamina skewers, 3 stamina greens, 2 hearty skewers, 2 hearty greens (1 big radish and 2 small radishes), 1 speed food, 1 attack up food

Use the minecart to X13.comment: Kill baby Taluses near the cart

_Equipment::Weapon<Royal Guard's Claymor.notes: Kill moblin, grab other claymore as well

Grab food.notes: raw and gourmet meat, banana, shrooms

_Cook<Cook food>.notes: 5 speed food, 1 hearty greens (1 big and regular radish), 6 stamina skewers

Talk to .npc(Toren).notes: A Gift For the Great Fairy

Talk to .npc(Beedle).notes: Sell all ores but luminous stones, opal and flint, buy arrows

_Material<Rushroom,10>.notes: On pillar and cliff as you climb to G34

Talk to .npc(Danda).notes: Sell all ores but opal and 9 luminous stones

Talk to .npc(Teake).comment: So we can enter the hideout

_Snap::Quest<Forgotten Sword>.notes: A Forgotten Sword, tree launch over

_Shrine::KemaKosassa.notes: Ice arrow + club, grab parts, grab rupee in chest

Upgrade house .!!(14 times).notes: If you have less than 5000 rupees, do this later

.!!(Upgrade slate).notes: Do this later if you don't have enough parts

_Cook<Cook food>.notes: 1x 1 stamina skewer, 1x 2 stamina skewer, 1x 3 durian meal

.boss(Shoot Dinraal).notes: Miss this one if he's too far away

_Korok::E01.notes: Pick up parts on the way

.boss(Shoot Dinraal).notes: We need 2 claws which we'll get later

_Shrine::TutsuwaNima.comment: Ice arrows + Axe, pick up parts

Talk to .npc(Toren).notes: A Gift for the Great Fairy

.boss(Activate pedestal).notes: IF early, do koroks after, if late, wait till next BM

_Cook<Cook food>.notes: 3x 2 endura carrots, 1x 3 endura shroom, 1x 2 endura shroom, 2x 1 endura shroom, 2x 5 hearty radish + durian

_Cook<Cook speed food>.notes: 13 speed food, use lotus when only 1 carrot

Talk to .npc(Fronk).notes: A Wife Washed Away, if not here he is by the pools

Talk to .npc(Hudson).notes: Pancake gets Mijah Rokee here, keep on going if you don't need to

_Tower::Eldin.notes: Remember you can 2-hand damage cancel spin. There are lots of deposits in Eldin, get as many as you can

_Shrine::ShoraHah.notes: Get Royal Bow, Great Flameblade, Giant Ancient Core, Silver Rupee and Ice Arrow x10 in shrine

.boss(Enter Rudania).notes: Use crates and smash ores where possible

.boss(Fireblight).notes: If your GEB breaks, use the lynel bow

.!!(Dark Beast).notes: This now gives us the star and % markers, which are useful for backing anything up. Re-load the game

_Shrine::KeoRuug.notes: 1-5 and 2-3 on left, 2-1 and 2-2 on right

_Shrine::MaagHalan.comment: Grab giant ancient core in shrine

_Shrine::KuhnSidajj.comment: Grab giant ancient core in shrine

_Warp::Shrine::DaqoChisay.notes: It is faster to do this than run in the sand to all the koroks

_Cook<Salmon Meuniere>.notes: Cook 2 speed food, 1x 5 truffle skewer, 1x 3 big hearty radish meal and 3 stamina food

Talk to .npc(Symin).notes: SELL SOMETHING if you sold a lot of an item recently, otherwise you'll get Compendium Glitch

_Shrine::RitaagZumo.comment: Grab giant anceint core in shrine

_Shrine::ShodaSah.comment: Grab key and ice arrows in shrine

_Shrine::KaamYatak.comment: Tree launch over, grab EOD and diamond in shrine

_Korok::N12.notes: Can save a gale here if fast naydra

.boss(Shoot Naydra).notes: May depend on how fast Naydra is
SHOULD have 4 horn, 2 scale, 2 claw, 2 fang now

_Shrine::KaoMakagh.comment: Get bow and rupee in shrine

_Korok::L65.notes: Don't do an ordinal windbomb, this is bug limit

.item(Park horse).notes: Don't whistle sprint until after Ishto Soh

_Shop<Buy All Arrows>.notes: Sell all ancient parts but small cores and all ores but 55 opal

_Snap::Elite<White Lizalfos>.notes: Can also get tail from blue lizalfos here

_Shrine::DunbaTaag.comment: Grab bow and thunderblade in shrine

_Shrine::GomaAsaagh.comment: Grab axe and claymore in shrine

_Shrine::MozoShenno.comment: Grab axe and diamond in shrine

.boss(Shoot Dinraal).notes: SHOULD have 4 horn 2 claw 2 scale 2 fang

_Boss::Talus::Rare.notes: Fury route here is very narrow, you may have to wait after arriving

_Shop<Sell all non-important items>.comment: Rubber clothes and ore except opal

Talk to .npc(Symin).notes: Need about 35K rupees here or 42K if you didn't ake pictures

.item(Upgrade armour).notes: Set of the Wild, Zora Armour and Champion's Tunic

Talk to .npc(Kilton).notes: Buy Horse bridle, saddle and monster extract, and get medals of honour

Talk to .npc(Chio).notes: The Korok Trials, check for quests now

_Memory::AshSwamp.notes: For verifying, show 1. the map counter, 2. the quest log, 3. the Master Sword, 4. the Key items tab
